website_summaries.verdict: Simple tablet form for a septic treatment that dissolves in the toilet and leaves no residue behind.
pros: Works well to eliminate most organic materials in the septic tank
Uses plant-based materials and ingredients to remain safe to use in all plumbing and septic systems
Works to reduce some odor problems from a septic system
Very easy to use and apply
cons: Doesn't neutralize certain types of odors

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money, Just Another Clever Example of Marketing Hype
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 2 stars not because there's anything wrong with the product, per se, but because it's just another example of clever marketing hype. And I was one of its victims.....until recently. We had our septic system pumped a couple of months ago. At that time the septic system professional set me straight. He said "There's absolutely no reason to use these products as there's more than enough bacteria in human feces to do the job."
customer_reviews.author: R.U. Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We had an odor problem in our toilet lately, a foul, egg like odor was coming from inside the toilet and using bleach didnt work. I used these tablets as soon as i received them. Flushed one tablet every night for four days before going to sleep and odor is gone. I will use these tablets monthly assuming odors were coming from septic tank..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordor Has Disappeared
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional product with great results. Our septic tank had a very strong odor since we moved into our house last year. After just two treatments the smell is now gone. Easy product to use and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Easiest of all
customer_reviews.text: These tablets are way more convenient about dissolution and usage compared to small soluble bags or liquids. I will see if they are working or not when i pump my septic..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I love that these tablets are so easy to use. Just drop and go!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well. smell is gone from my smaller half bath that does not get much use. will re order!

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while and never had a septic issue. It’s getting warm here and still no odors around my septic tank. Really easy to use. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions on the package, and I flushed one down the toilet. Took another tablet and added to bucket of water and dumped down the tub, bathroom sink and kitchen sink. It got rid of the nasty sewer odor that I get every summer during humid weather. I plan on buying more! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Esay To Use
customer_reviews.text: I have had several septic tank treatments, but this is by far the easiest to use. Tablets are convenient and not messy at all. I have never really had septic tank issues, so this is my ounce of prevention.

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a Tablet!!

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, reasonably priced

customer_reviews.title: Enzyme Packets For Septic Tanks

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with the Enzytabs treatment
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with the Enzytabs treatment. I purchased to use in sink drain pipe in a small mall market setting. Manager will not pay to take care of back up problems and at times the pipes and toilets back up and over flow. Smell is bad. The Enzytabs actually cleaned the drain pipe 12 inches down to the elbow. Am waiting for another week to go by, and if the pipes have not cleared more, will be adding a 2nd tablet, . . . just might get another 12-20 inches cleaned out. So far, still dealing with the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Better than RID.. powder
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the "RID.." brand powder and decided to change it after seeing larvae and bugs in the box. It was disgusting! Although some people say septic additives do not work, i believe adding more bacteria to the system is not a bad idea. As i didn’t have any problem with my septic till now, i assume they are working. Compared to "RID.." these tablets are easier to use, take less storage space and they do not leave any residue after flushing. I’m at second month and no problems till now. I will stick with these tablets. Recommended.

I will get more when i run out.

customer_reviews.title: A shot of good bacteria for your septic tank
customer_reviews.text: So, whenever the septic company came out to pump they would tell us too much paper floating and not enough bacteria inside the tank. Started using these tabs and now no more issues with too much paper and not enough bacteria! Less frequent pump out too. I think these definitely helped our tank.
customer_reviews.author: KDI

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time we've ordered these and put them in every month. Can't really tell if they work or not, but, not problems with the septic system. And, that's a good thing! Prompt service and a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easiest septic tank treatment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using another brand and pouring a box of powder down the toilet every month for my septic tank maintenance. Decided to give this a try and I really like these tablets better than powder applications. Takes less space for storage and very easy to use! Simply drop it in the toilet, wait for tablet to dissolve and flush. NO need to flush 3-4 times like i used to do for powders! Just one flush is enough for this.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tabs, because I was smelling a foul odor from my septic tank after a hard rain. I used a tab once it arrived in the mail. We have had rain since and the odor has definitely subsided even with a lot of rain. I definitely recommend this product and will be buying some more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas43

customer_reviews.title: I dont think it does anything.
customer_reviews.text: I mean, i used it. it made no difference to smell, backups and the gulp in septic tank pipe remained the same (i felt stupid for opening pipe for beliveing that product will work as most good regiews claimed), not a drain opener for sure. in theory it can serve as a septic tank system as i am a microbiologist myself but in practicality, not even close. it gav eit five stars for ease of use as u are simply taking tab out and throwing it in.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem with odor coming from the drains. I followed the directions on the package and when we got up the next day the smells were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie Otter

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These septic system treatment tablets were the easiest treatment I have ever tried. No measuring so you can't possibly pour in too much at one time. Just pop one into the toilet before bed at night. Let it dissolve. Flush and you're DONE!! It did not leave any residue in my toilet. The four month supply is easy to store in the resealable zipper pouch package. I love that this product has not been tested on animals and is phosphate free. Great new concept in septic treatment options.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Lu

customer_reviews.title: We just had our septic pumped, and they suggested ...
customer_reviews.text: We just had our septic pumped, and they suggested a bacteria additive to give it a little extra boost for the bacteria found in the tank. After a lot of research, and reading of reviews, I have purchased this product. It is very simple to use. You just drop it in the toilet, wait for it to dissolve, and flush. The quality of the product beyond this point, I’ll never know, since I don’t tend to open my septic, and see how things are going in there! The package does, however, suggest to use the tablet in the toilet at night when it’s less used.
customer_reviews.author: boofanna

customer_reviews.title: These tablets worked great to break down nasty stuff in the toilet
customer_reviews.text: These tablets worked great to break down nasty stuff in the toilet. I could instantly tell a difference! I own a small private school for children, so keeping the toilet and septic system up and running is always a problem. It definitely seems like these enzyme tablets will help though!

customer_reviews.title: Good for more than septic tanks

This always works to clear out biological matter. I alternate these monthly with tabs to help reduce the hard water deposits. NOTE: I don't have a septic tank, I have city utilities.

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with enzytab
customer_reviews.text: In my town the tap water is smelly. I use water filter for drinking water but in the bathroom toilet is get brown color in the bowl. I'm happy with enzytab. It helps reduce bad smell. I highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient- Time will gage the value

customer_reviews.author: cluigi

customer_reviews.title: Great for upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: What do you say about something that goes into your septic tank? I didn't taste them; I never noticed bad odors from my septic tank before or after using these tablets, and I'm not going to stick my nose over the tank to compare these with other products. However, these are unquestionably the easiest to use; all you have to be able to do is to hit the inside of your toilet bowl with a packet of tablets then flush a few minutes later. So far, so good and I ordered a second box.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Carleton

product_meta.title: Enzytabs Septic Tank System Treatment, Billions of Enzyme Producing Bacteria Reduce Bad Odors and Help Prevent Backups, 4 Month Supply (4 Tablets)
feature_bullets: HELPS PREVENT SEPTIC BACKUPS: Helps prevent septic system backup by effectively degrading grease, starch, protein, and tissue on an ongoing, long-term basis.
REDUCES BAD ODORS: Helps reduce septic tank odors by continuously breaking down the odorous volatile fatty acids and other odor-causing organic buildup.
EASY TO USE: Pre-measured effervescent tablets. No mixing, No measuring, No spill, No mess! Simply flush it down the toilet.
ECO-FRIENDLY: Made with plant based ingredients. Completely biodegradable. Phosphate FREE. Ultra concentrated for less packaging. SAFE FOR ALL PLUMBING.
4-MONTH SUPPLY: Contains 4 effervescent tablets. Each tablet treats septic tanks up to 1500 gallons for one month.
